caption.p: Anomalies of the ( a) ocean heat content (10 22 J) (ocean impact), ( b) vertical wind shear (m s −1) (dynamical impact), and ( c) potential intensity (m s −1) (thermodynamical impact) over the eastern Main Development Region by total (A), linear trend (B), detrended (C), ENSO impact, AMM impact, and the NAO impact in August/September 2017. Note that detrending was done for the data available period 1982–2017.
